sentences.en: Autarky and specialization division of labor is the means that people organization economy differs two kinds.
sentences.cn: 自给自足和专业化分工是人们组织经济两种不同的方式.

sentences.en: Figures on the decline in world trade are horrible for anybody except anti - globalisation advocates of autarky.
sentences.cn: 世界贸易下降的数据对任何人都是可怕的,当然反对全球化倡导自给自足的人除外.

sentences.en: Long - term since, in the natural economy that agriculture is in dispersive, backward, autarky all the time.
sentences.cn: 长期以来, 农业一直处于分散 、 落后 、 自给自足的自然经济之中.

sentences.en: One kind is the viewpoint of traditional autarky.
sentences.cn: 一种为传统的自给自足的观点.

sentences.en: Pakistanis' growing sense of autarky has led them to overplay their hand in negotiations with the United States.
sentences.cn: 巴基斯坦日益增强的自给自足意识使得他们在同美国谈判时过高地估计了自己。

sentences.en: Were Indians “mindlessly aping” Western lifestyles more or less when India had its idiotic policy of autarky?
sentences.cn: 印度自给自足的的白痴政策是多少在“盲目模仿”西方的生活方式么？

sentences.en: What the farmer values still is the cash income beyond autarky.
sentences.cn: 农民看重的还是自给自足以外的现金收入.

words.tran_cn: 经济独立的，自给自足的
经济独立的；自给自足的

trans.tran_en: (esp of a political unit) a system or policy of economic self-sufficiency aimed at removing the need for imports
